requirements.description: A simple scientific calculator implemented as a web application, focused on providing core arithmetic and basic scientific functions using React.

features.name: Basic Arithmetic Operations
features.description: Perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

features.name: Scientific Functions
features.description: Implement trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan), logarithmic functions (log, ln), exponential functions (e^x), power functions (x^y), and square root.

features.name: Input/Output Display
features.description: A clear display area for current input, operations, and results.

features.name: Clear and Backspace Functionality
features.description: Buttons to clear the entire input/result (AC/C) and to delete the last entered digit (DEL).

features.name: Decimal Point Input
features.description: Support for entering and calculating with decimal numbers.

features.name: Toggle Sign
features.description: A button to change the sign of the current number (positive/negative).

features.name: Order of Operations (PEMDAS/BODMAS)
features.description: Correctly apply mathematical order of operations for complex expressions.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Handle common errors like division by zero or invalid input gracefully.

features.name: Keyboard Support
features.description: Allow users to input numbers and operations using their physical keyboard.

requirements.user_input: build a simple scientific calculator web app using react
